name: Puzzle Bobble 4
description: You'll be Forever Bursting Bubbles! Bust-A-Move-4 is bursting onto the scene with more advanced gameplay, and tons of new features. It's a challenge for the whole family!* Bury opponents with the devastating new Chain Reactions.* Keep the bubbles in balance with the new Pulley Mechanism.* Rank yourself with the comprehensive Ranking System.* Save custom puzzles to Memory Cards with Edit Mode.
